title: OOHTML
desc: A suite of new DOM features that lets us write modular, reusable, and reactive HTML, offering robust UI development with none of a framework.

features.title: Reusable HTML
features.desc: Write once, use everywhere with the all-new HTML module, export and import paradigm.

features.title: Reactive HTML
features.desc: Get the plain old HTML kicking in sync with your application state, entirely within markup.

features.title: Namespaced HTML
features.desc: Write collision-free IDs with HTML namespaces; meet the hack-free approach.

features.title: All On the Fly!
features.desc: Ditch the compile step! Just code and preview. Even edit from your browser console.
